snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 545: Sonic Lost Adventure: Havok Harbor (SAGE2014 Act 1 & 2)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Lost Adventure: Havok Harbor (SAGE2014 Act 1 & 2)
Credit: Kevin "Highwire" Ethridge
Release Date: February 23rd, 2014

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

(SAGE2014 Act 1)
00:00 - Boot&Stuff
01:44 - Havok Harbor Zone
07:49 - Credits

(SAGE2014 Act 2)
08:11 - Tutorial Zone
10:16 - Havok Harbor Zone

NOTES: Sonic now enters Havok Harbor which has no relation to Metal Harbor outside of the music.
So why is he here?
For no particular reason other than to admire the fact that there is an unrealistic amount of cargo containers stacked in ways unimaginable.
As he jumps across them same for various ships along the way noice!
Generally speaking this is a 3D Game Graphics class project that later got turned into a full level.
Out of 7 total levels this is the third and only one to exist as playable, will we see the rest?
Probably not.
But at least we got to speed through the Harbor killing all the Square Badniks imaginable and those treated spikey spinning little Badnik pieces of....
ANYWAY! Overall pretty cool.
Should of recorded it with a higher quality bit-rate but oh well.
If you have a decent PC then it's worth a try so one can admire the multi colored containers.
